posts.post_content:
Chance Batting fairly graded as Good in a BVG 2 holder.

Nice eye appeal and centering.  Sweet cap 350-460 Fact 30 reverse

Nice card for the grade

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10074/chance-batting[/IMG]

Will not last long at $115 shipped.  Affordable HOFers as attractive as this are becoming hard to find.  Funds net to me PP F&F preferred.
